title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 506.6 - Requisition of materials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 506.6 - Requisition of materials

State Regulations

The taking or requisitioning of emergency material, supplies, equipment and facilities under subdivision 3 of section 25 of the

Defense Emergency Act, shall be resorted to when for any reason purchase or
rental becomes impracticable and payment or settlement of same shall be made in
accordance with said subdivision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
506.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
